hero.title: Discover Original Art
hero.subtitle: by Bibisora
hero.description: Explore a unique collection of paintings and digital artworks by Uzbek artist Bibisora. Each piece tells a story of culture, emotion, and beauty.

about.title: About Bibisora
about.subtitle: Uzbek Artist & Creative Soul
about.bio: Bibisora is a talented Uzbek artist whose work bridges traditional Central Asian aesthetics with contemporary artistic expression. Her paintings explore themes of identity, cultural heritage, and the beauty of everyday life. Each artwork is created with passion and meticulous attention to detail, making every piece a unique treasure.
